Systematic mediastinal lymph node sampling was performed at the following stations:

Station 10R: Id[REDACTED] homogeneous lymph node measuring 8.4mm (short axis) x 29.3mm (long axis). 4 passes performed with 21G needle. ROSE: Malignant - NSCLC NOS.
Station 10L: Id[REDACTED] hypoechoic lymph node measuring 13.7mm (short axis) x 21.1mm (long axis). 3 passes performed with 21G needle. ROSE: Adequate lymphocytes, no malignancy.
Station 2L: Id[REDACTED] homogeneous lymph node measuring 11.1mm (short axis) x 30.7mm (long axis). 3 passes performed with 21G needle. ROSE: Malignant - adenocarcinoma.

PART 2: ROBOTIC BRONCHOSCOPY FOR PERIPHERAL LESION

Following completion of mediastinal staging, the Ion robotic bronchoscopy system was deployed.

Target lesion: LUL anterior (B3)
Lesion characteristics:
- Size: 29.8 mm

Navigation was performed successfully with registration error < 3mm. The robotic catheter was advanced to the target location. Radial EBUS probe was deployed confirming adjacent view of the lesion.
